sense.name: Place troops or weapons in battle formation.
sense.examples: The U.S. deploys its weapons in the Middle East. The Army deployed today in Afghanistan.

sense.name: Distribute systematically or strategically; initiate.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Do not use for military frame. Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] DEPLOY NP2[theme] NP1[agent] DEPLOY NP2[instrument]
sense.examples: The FED deployed new interest rates today. The company plans to deploy new software in the coming year. NASA deployed research tools to scour the surface of Mars.
